name: Abisal
description:
Ludum Dare #48 Entry: Deeper and Deeper

A small game where you explore caves at the depth of the ocean. Avoid stalactites and the creatures that roam these parts and get as deep as you can get!

Controlls:

  • Left Click: Perform a long dash.
  • Right Click: Perform a short dash.

Credits:

  • Code: itsoisi and me
  • Art: itsoisi
  • UI Icons: me
  • Music: me
  • Font: BitPotion by Joeb Rogers
  • Palette: Oil 6 by GrafxKid
